#summary Release notes for BETA7 release.

=== BETA7 Release Notes ===
August 24, 2009.

=== Enhancements ===

  * Added ING Netherlands import.
  * Dialog settings are now saved and used next time dialog is opened.

=== Fixes ===

  * Fixed Main Menu problem on Mac OS X.
  * Fixed date format detection problem.
  * Ensured compatibility with Java 1.5.
